description:
Alpine rock is calling. For full day adventures above the treeline, these technical pants hold up to the job. Stretch fabric and articulated construction lend themselves to high stepping or stemming, and rugged nylon panels provide extra protection in chimneys.

  • Lightweight recycled polyester softshell has plenty of stretch
  • Durable recycled nylon and spandex panels resist rock abrasion
  • PFC-free DWR finish provides protection in light rain
  • Low-profile waistband is comfortable under a harness or backpack
  • Articulated knees and paneled construction move with you
  • Zippered thigh pocket sits above the knee and below the leg loops
name: Patagonia Terravia Alpine Pants - Men's
